name: Signature: Mr. President
description:
You're the president! How cool is that?
As such, you'll animate meetings, participate in interviews... that's a lot a responsability you know.

Also, don't be suspicious.

What ? I didn't say anything.. you're the president!

(A Game made in 48h for GDS Game Jam 2020, with the theme "Disinformation and Conspiracy Theories!)
